text: Hi all! In our company, we are redesigning the whole website. We go page by page. So I created a page and I need to publish it and unpublish the old one. HS warns me about broken links. If the link is the same on the specific subpage (landing page), do I need to do smth extra or can I just unpublish the old one and publish the new one? For marketing, there is another person. :smile: Thanks!
I’m sure some scopes were missing last time I tried private apps, I hope you can actually use all the api’s now
<@U03BA1XSWUV> Your marketing person should use the staging area if you've redesigned the full website.
